channel.title: Giampaolo Rodola - performance
channel.description: Python enthusiast, core developer, psutil author

item.title: psutil 5.5.0 is twice as fast
item.description: OK, this is a big one. Starting from psutil 5.0.0 you can query multiple Process information around twice as fast than with previous versions (see original ticket and updated doc). It took me 7 months, 108 commits and a massive refactoring of psutil internals (here is the big â€¦
item.dc:creator: Giampaolo Rodola
